item.title: Getting Started with Regular Expressions Visual Tools + Real-Time Testing, Master Syntax and Application in 30 Minutes
item.description: Regular expressions are widely used in data cleaning, form validation, and other scenarios. This article introduces core syntax (character classes, quantifiers, grouping) and practical extraction/replace techniques. Addressing common pain points like difficult syntax comprehension, inefficient debugging, and poor reusability, visual regular expression tools leverage interactive charts, real-time testing, and test case management to help developers efficiently master complex patterns.
